title: title
enum_description: When enum values are provided, only these values are allowed. When no enum values are provided, any value is allowed.
name: name
localDescription: databases are stored in your disk as flat JSON file(s) within the specified directory. You can choose to store the data in one single JSON file or multiple JSON files.
browserDescription: databases are stored in your browser's IndexedDB.
singleJSONFileDescription: data are stored in one single JSON file e.g. using with lowdb.
multipleJSONFilesDescription: data are stored in multiple JSON files. For instance, you are managing data of a book store with books.json, authors.json and publishers.json.
authorize_description: authorize Low CMS to access the directory
schema_of: schame of each document in the collection
content_type_description:
Low CMS supports 2 content types
- collection (array of objects)
- document (object)
add_content_tooltip_1: select the JSON file that stores the content
add_content_tooltip_2: select the field that stores the content, or select the entire file
add_content_tooltip_3: configure the schema of the content
content_in_entire_file: the content is stored in the entire file
content_in_specific_field: the content is stored in a specific field
alert_array_file_only: the file content is an array of objects. Only "{x}" is supported.
add_content_confirmation: Confirm to add a content "{x}" with the schema "{y}"?
view_as_documents_group_description: view documents with the same schema
